channel.title: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
channel.itunes:author: Snap! Productions
channel.description:
Being a Student at Auburn University during football season is an experience that stays with you no matter where you go afterward. Even when that place is a completely different world with no concept of real SEC football, real barbecue or real... er... reality, true fans find a way to make it work. The Hollywood Tiger Mafia is one such group. Through this podcast, you are invited to join Lynne, Stacy and Tommy -along with surprise guests -in experiencing the Auburn football season with a uniquely Hollywood point of view. Each episode will contain pre-game outlooks, post-game reviews, and TV viewing tips -including recipes and decorating ideas. Naturally there will also be a healthy dose of 'bama bashing as well.
The Hollywood Tiger Mafia podcast will strive to bring fans together from all over the world to share in the glory of Auburn gameday.
Welcome to the family.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Three Auburn University grads surviving football season in the SEC-deprived world of Hollywood, share their slickly produced nuggets of pre-game comedy.
channel.itunes:summary:
Being a Student at Auburn University during football season is an experience that stays with you no matter where you go afterward. Even when that place is a completely different world with no concept of real SEC football, real barbecue or real... er... reality, true fans find a way to make it work. The Hollywood Tiger Mafia is one such group. Through this podcast, you are invited to join Lynne, Stacy and Tommy -along with surprise guests -in experiencing the Auburn football season with a uniquely Hollywood point of view. Each episode will contain pre-game outlooks, post-game reviews, and TV viewing tips -including recipes and decorating ideas. Naturally there will also be a healthy dose of 'bama bashing as well.
The Hollywood Tiger Mafia podcast will strive to bring fans together from all over the world to share in the glory of Auburn gameday.
Welcome to the family.
channel.itunes:keywords: SEC football, football, Auburn University, Tigers, War Eagle, Tuberville, Southeastern Conference, Alabama, Auburn fans

item.title: HTM Iron Bowl Special 2008
item.itunes:author: The Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: For Iron Bowl 2008, the challenge is all too real. If our Tigers are to notch number seven, we'll need Faith, hope and determination to get us there. We feature special guests Thom Gossom Jr., and Gary Anthony Williams in our quest for redemption. This full length episode features the opening special guest banter, "Word on the Street" and our 2nd annual Iron Bowl church service with Reverend Langdon Samford.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is it folks! The last hope for redemption has arrived. We celebrate Iron Bowl countdown with a full length show.www.hollywoodtigermafia.com
item.itunes:summary: For Iron Bowl 2008, the challenge is all too real. If our Tigers are to notch number seven, we'll need Faith, hope and determination to get us there. This full length episode features the opening special guest banter, "Word on the Street" and our 2nd annual Iron Bowl church service with Reverend Langdon Samford.

item.title: Iron Bowl Update 08 Week 09
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description:
Hi Fans~ visit www.hollywoodtigermafia.com the new segments post there first AND we've got t-shirts, hats, mugs and stuff.
This week we face off with the 'bammers in a scare-off. After we get a little rattled, our special spooky guest reminds us that the ones with the most to lose are the ones with the most to fear.
item.itunes:subtitle: A spooky guest reminds us who should be scared this season. www.hollywoodtigermafia.com

item.title: Iron Bowl Update 08 Week 08
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description:
Hi Fans~ visit www.hollywoodtigermafia.com the new segments post there first AND we've got t-shirts, hats, mugs and stuff.
The Auburn Faithful sure have to deal with a lot of drama these days. It's just never easy, almost like a soap opera don't you think? Listen to "The Games of Our Lives" and try to remember that this too shall pass.
item.itunes:subtitle: Like scores through a goal post, so go "The Games of Our Lives." www.hollywoodtigermafia.com

item.title: Iron Bowl Update 08 Week 07.mp3
item.itunes:author: The Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: Well, well, well it's been an interesting week since we've left off. Seems we're a family divided in trying times. Sometimes, listening to both sides of the story helps. We offer to you, the weary fans, "Point/Counterpoint." Maybe it'll help us all sleep a little better. WAR EAGLE AUBURN FAITHFUL it's shaping up to be a tasty victory come November!
item.itunes:subtitle: The pundits on "Football Face-off" reveal more than just a difference of opinion, and it takes the perspective of youth to straighten things out.

item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: While on a layover in Loachapoka, the mafia discover a little known museum that pays tribute to the stadium we most love to win in (and have never lost in!) That's right y'all. Bryant-Denny Stadium.

item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: The Hollywood Tiger Mafia is doing it's show in smaller pieces this year until we can secure some loving and nurturing sponsors. If you would like to see us go back to the full length show every week, please share us with your friends... especially if your friends run a large corporation's advertising department.

item.title: Iron Bowl Special-Episode 12
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: The Iron Bowl is a spiritual experience for the Hollywood Tiger Mafia. Special guest star Gary Anthony Williams (of Boston Legal) takes us to a higher place in this church themed season finale.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is it. The spectacular season finale. It all comes down to one game: IRON BOWL!

item.title: Georgia-Episode 11
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: The gang comes back strong after a light week and builds up steam for a showdown between the hedges with a fabulous report from Lynne’s scout. Stacy digs down to her culinary roots for some deep south style. Then, Ken Burns watch out! We bring a report on our oldest rivalry that rivals any war you ever heard of. And finally, the archives render a gem from an earlier time and you get to decide if ‘bama jokes improve with age.
item.itunes:subtitle: With the deep south's oldest rivalry coming up, history is the the theme behind this week's show.
item.itunes:summary: The gang comes back strong after a light week and builds up steam for a showdown between the hedges with a fabulous report from Lynne’s scout. item.title: Homecoming Special-Episode 10
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: The Hollywood Tiger Mafia takes this week off from producing a full show. Instead, each of us share our own "Auburn Moment" --the story or event that best epitomizes our Auburn Experience. We'll be back with a full episode for the Georgia game. Happy Homecoming, and WAR EAGLE!
item.itunes:subtitle: For homecoming, we present our "Auburn Moments" in this abbreviated show.

item.title: Ole Miss-Episode 9
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description:
On this special Halloween edition of the Hollywood Tiger Mafia Podcast:
We visit a spooky Hollywood graveyard to reflect on a tough loss to LSU, and prepare for another SEC battle against Ole Miss --with the help of Lynne’s mysterious guest. Then Stacy takes some horrific advice with a grain of salt… and a drop of blood. Finally the crew goes paranormal with conversation from beyond the grave and (head) breaking news from undead Tide faithful.
item.itunes:subtitle: A very special Halloween edition in preparation for a home game vs. Ole Miss.
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: LSU-Episode 8
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: After a squeaker on the road in Fayetteville the Hollywood Tiger Mafia must get themselves right back up for a tiger on tiger slugfest down on the Bayou, but tensions come to a head as Tommy and Lynne face off over the mafia’s scouting staff. Then Stacy shares some Cajun style, Tommy makes progress in the search for ‘cue, and the Lynne gets everyone to consider the path not taken –Thank God we didn't go to LSU! Finally we salute 'bama fan of questionable character,Tavis Childers.
item.itunes:subtitle: The crew gears up for tiger on tiger action in Baton Rouge.
item.itunes:summary: After a squeaker on the road in Fayetteville the Hollywood Tiger Mafia must get themselves right back up for a tiger on tiger slugfest down on the Bayou, but tensions come to a head as Tommy and Lynne face off over the mafia’s scouting staff. item.title: Arkansas-Episode 7
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: With the Commodores slammed, we review the good points and the great points of a 35 to 7 victory, and look ahead to an SEC west showdown with Arkansas. Then see what happens when the girls take a vacation, leaving the style plan with Tommy and Nathan. Just in time for the fall TV season, we give you a look at the steamy new razorback drama set in the Ozarks, and tell ‘bama fans how they can now find relief with a brand new product.
item.itunes:subtitle: The team is looking better than ever going into an SEC West Showdown at Arkansas.
item.itunes:summary: With the Commodores slammed, we review the good points and the great points of a 35 to 7 victory, and look ahead to an SEC west showdown with Arkansas. Just in time for the fall TV season, we give you a look at the steamy new razorback drama set in the Ozarks, and tell ‘bama fans how they can now find relief with a brand new product.

item.title: Vanderbilt -Episode 6
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description:
On this edition of the Hollywood Tiger Mafia podcast…
Can you say basking in the afterglow of mind-blowing euphoria? We confirm that yes, beating Florida is indeed that good. We get a scouting report from Lynne, a tasty dessert from Stacy and a history lesson from Nathan; all themed nicely on those adorable little commodores of Vanderbuilt. Brandon Cox gets new interest from an old admirer. And of course, we check in on those unlovable losers in Crimson.
item.itunes:subtitle: Basking in the afterglow of Florida, the Mafia push ahead to the Vandy game with their mascot somehow key to this week's theme.

item.title: Florida -Episode 5
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: On this edition of the Hollywood Tiger Mafia Podcast, we bask in the glow of our old familiar friend, victory, with a look back at New Mexico State, and look ahead to next week as we go on the road... and into the swamp. Stacy takes TV to task as she whips up an SEC classic combo. Then it’s a yellow flag kind of night when the mafia invites a real live gator over for dinner. And finally, we update your iron bowl joke book with a retro go go.
item.itunes:subtitle: The HTM bounces back with the New Mexico State victory and looks ahead to the Florida game with a dinner guest from Gainsville.

item.title: New Mexico State - Episode 4
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: The loss to Mississippi State dealt a serious blow to the enthusiasm of the HTM, but not being ones to be kept down long, they bounce back with a Mexican fiesta theme. Post game review with a special guest. Word on the street about New Mexico State. Getting to know the philosophy of stylin' Stacy. Tommy ventures to the canyons for BBQ. Lynne breaks things off with an old flame. Iron bowl update takes on a Mexican flare.
item.itunes:subtitle: After a second tough loss, the Mafia changes their approach to the season with a Mexican Fiesta theme.

item.title: Mississippi State-Episode 3
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: The Mafia is hurting after a shocking upset by the South Florida Bulls. Post-game analysis reveals problems that must be solved by game time on Saturday. Mississippi State's coach has a funny name and they are located in a boring town, but still should not be taken lightly. Tommy, Stacy and Lynne put together a pep rally to boost Nathan's spirits and Stacy does a native American craft to the same end. Finally, the Mafia performs reenactments of Auburn responses to 'bama fans who "flame" AU online discussions.
item.itunes:subtitle: The crew recovers from a devastating loss and prepares for the SEC season opener.

item.title: South Florida-Episode 2
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: Stacy, Lynne and Tommy review the tense season opener vs. Kansas State then look ahead to this weekend's South Florida game. Stacy plans a Cuban theme in honor of Tampa. Lynne salutes Enterprise, AL. Then young Nathan is dispatched to Tuscaloosa to study the cult-like tendencies of 'bama fans while Tommy reviews a "Barbecue Joint" in the San Fernando Valley.
item.itunes:subtitle: Week two of the season begins with a look back at the K-state victory and a look ahead to South Florida

item.title: Pre-Season/ K-State Season Opener
item.itunes:author: Hollywood Tiger Mafia
item.description: Premier Episode: The HTM scouting report includes pre-season news, gossip and opinion, Stacy sets the scene with food and drink ideas, Nathan rates gameday behavior "M" for mature, Tommy takes on the search for 'cue in Los Angeles, Lynne goes one-on-one with Coach Saban. Music by R33SE from Alabama. Check out our myspace page for more.
